title: Upgrade Solar Sparkle logo and apply across header/footer

requirements.text: Create an upgraded Solar Sparkle logo based on the two user-uploaded references (image-12.png, ONLY LOGO.jpeg), keeping the same recognizable solar + panel concept but with cleaner geometry, sharper edges, consistent stroke widths, improved contrast, and transparent background.
acceptanceCriteria: New logo files are produced as static images (PNG) with transparent background.
Logo appears crisp at small sizes (e.g., 32â€“48px height) without visible jagged edges or blurred artifacts.
Color palette is cohesive and modern (no muddy gradients or low-contrast details).

requirements.text: Add the upgraded logo image assets to the frontend as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and ensure no runtime/backend dependency is required to load them.
acceptanceCriteria: Upgraded logo assets exist in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The app loads the logo assets via /assets/generated/... paths with no network calls besides static asset fetches.

requirements.text: Update the site to use the upgraded logo consistently in both the header and footer, replacing the current header logo source (/assets/solar_sparkle-removebg-preview.png) and the current footer logo source (/assets/generated/solar-sparkle-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png).
acceptanceCriteria: Header (frontend/src/components/Header.tsx) uses the new generated logo asset path.
Footer (frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx) uses the new generated logo asset path.
Logo sizing remains visually balanced (no layout shift or overflow) on mobile and desktop breakpoints.

requirements.text: Add a favicon using the upgraded logo and wire it into the HTML head so browser tabs show the updated branding.
acceptanceCriteria: A favicon image file exists in frontend/public (or another appropriate static location) and is referenced from frontend/index.html.
After build, the browser tab displays the new favicon.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep backend unchanged; do not add new canisters/services or external dependencies.
nonGoals: Redesigning site layout, copy, navigation, or marketing sections beyond what is necessary to swap logo assets.
Implementing new authentication, CMS, or backend storage related to branding.

required: Upgraded solar + panel emblem logo, transparent background (solar-sparkle-logo-mark-transparent.dim_512x512.png)
Upgraded horizontal logo lockup with emblem + wordmark on one line, transparent background (solar-sparkle-logo-lockup-horizontal-transparent.dim_1200x300.png)
Favicon derived from the upgraded emblem, transparent background (favicon-solar-sparkle.dim_64x64.png)
edits: Refine/modernize existing transparent logo mark while preserving concept (solar-sparkle-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png > solar-sparkle-logo-transparent-v2.dim_200x200.png)
